Identity.Name: Alchemist Uzrill
Identity.Basic_Description: Small Ratfolk looking humanoid with hunched back and green flames in a vial

Abilities.Name: Concoct
Abilities.Ability: Cost 4 energy: If you have less than 3 vial tokens, add one vial token to this unit. Start the game with 3 vial tokens on this unit

Abilities.Name: Vial of Borax
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, choose a unit within 10 range. Roll a d20. On a roll lower than 10, that unit takes 1 distress. Repeat this ability for the closest unit within 3 range of the chosen unit if that has not been targeted yet this turn.

Abilities.Name: Vial of Smoke
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, Choose a location within 7 range. Put a Smoke Bomb template on it. All line of site and movement abilities within within 5 range of of that template are blocked. Remove this token at the start of Uzrill's next turn.

Abilities.Name: Vial of Incense
Abilities.Ability: Cost 1 Vial Token: Once per turn as an action, Choose a location  within 7 range of Uzrill. Put an Incense Template on it. Any unit starting its turn or that moves within 3 range of the token loses 1 energy that turn. (energy cannot be reduced below 1)
